pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Formula with Vitamin E 100g Jar
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Solid Formula Jar is a unique formula which melts into skin upon applying, creating a protective barrier that locks in moisture. Fast absorbing, and ideal for deep moisturisation, including overnight treatments.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Relieves rough, dry skin. For 24 hour moisture. Pure Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E. Suitable for eczema prone skin. Soothes skin after sun exposure. Smoothes marks and scars. Paraben and Phthalate Free.

Ingredients

Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Mineral Oil (0Paraffinum Liquidum), Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Dimethicone, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopheryl, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Beta Carotene (CI 40800), Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate.

Directions

Use it on cracked heels, elbows, dry skin around knees or even on your lips.
